entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 25.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 25. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016
